item.title: Circluar plots in R and adding images
item.description: Last post was definately my most succesful (and I have so much experience :P). But it was fun with all the feedback and appreciation. So Iâ€™ll continue with a little more plotting. Cirlular plots are becoming more and more popular in for visualising associatetions between different phenomena. I think they look pretty cool, and while I have not yet published a paper with it, I did prep a lot of scripts for plotting my analysis results with it, with BRAINS!
